name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Software Engineer specializing in Data Platforms, I bring 8+ years of experience in creating scalable distributed systems and high-performance applications. Expert in **Go**, I leverage technologies such as **gRPC**, **Kubernetes**, and **AWS** to design and implement robust cloud-native solutions. Proficient with **SQL databases** including **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **ClickHouse**, I optimize data storage and retrieval for enhanced performance. My skillset includes knowledge of **caching systems** like **Redis**, and I manage **messaging systems** such as **RabbitMQ**, **Kafka**, **NATS**, and **NSQ** to ensure data consistency and reliable real-time communication. I excel in building event-driven architectures and streaming pipelines that facilitate effective data flow. Additionally, I emphasize clean code practices, performance optimization, and strong observability through monitoring and debugging. My effective English communication skills contribute to collaborative team environments, ensuring alignment on project goals while delivering enterprise-grade solutions.
